scripts.postinstall: npm run functions:install && npm run server:install && npm run xelib:install && npm run parse:install && npm run front:install && npm run client:install
scripts.server:start:clean: npm run server:delete:world && npm run server:start
scripts.parse:all: npm run parse:unpack && npm run parse:csv && npm run parse:json
scripts.git:ignore:refresh: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m ".gitignore is now working"
scripts.git:update: git add * && git commit -m "Обновился" && git push
scripts.git:log: git log --graph --abbrev-commit --decorate --all --format=format:"%C(bold blue)%h%C(reset) - %C(bold cyan)%aD%C(dim white) - %an%C(reset) %C(bold green)(%ar)%C(reset)%C(bold yellow)%d%C(reset)%n %C(white)%s%C(reset)"
